creator: Brainteaser Puzzle Game Studio
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the best FREE and addictive nut sort, nuts and bolts color sorting game! It is the ultimate nuts sort puzzle game where fun meets relaxation!

With iron plate challenges, mysterious nuts that keep you guessing 🧐, and surprise special sorting levels that pop up when you least expect them 🤩, every round is packed with fun and excitement. Plus, with a variety of cool themes, there's always something new to explore. 🥰

It's not just about the challenge, it's about the chill. 🥳Enjoy unlimited shuffles, skip levels at your leisure, and take all the time you need. No rush, no pressure, just pure sorting bliss. 😎

With powerful bolt tools, a generous reward system, and over ten thousand levels, this nut sort game is guaranteed to keep you hooked. Whether you're a color-match newbie or a sort-it master, Nuts Sort is your ticket to endless sorting fun!

How to Play Nuts Sort Puzzles?
- Tap a bolt to pick up a nut, then tap another bolt to place it.
- You can only stack nuts of the same color together, and only if there's enough space on the bolt.
- Your mission is to organize all the nuts by color on their own bolts to finish the level.
- Use "Undo" to backtrack your moves, or "Shuffle" if you're unsure what to do next.
- Stuck? Add an "Extra Bolt" to help you out.
- Feel free to skip levels whenever you want and keep mastering the nuts and bolts sort puzzle!

What Makes This Game Stand Out?
🤩 Diverse Themes
Explore a wide range of themes that make each color sort game feel fresh and exciting.
🔥 Over 10,000 Levels
Challenge yourself with over ten thousand levels in this nuts and bolts color sort game.
🔩 Iron Plate Challenges
Take on iron plate levels that add an extra layer of strategy to your nuts and bolts sort puzzle.
❓ Mysterious Nuts
Face the thrill of unknown colors with our question mark nuts.
🤔 Special Levels
Encounter special levels that add a twist to your sorting adventure.
😎 Unlimited Replays
Replay levels as often as you like in this sort-it game.
💯 Extra Bolts and Undo Tools
Use extra bolts and undo tools to make every move count.
🏅 Level Skipping
Skip levels at any time and keep your sorting journey smooth. No need to get stuck - just sort it your way!
🎯 No Time Limits
Enjoy the freedom of no time limits in this color sort puzzle. Play at your own pace and master every level!
🎁 Generous Rewards
Earn generous rewards as you master each level. The more you play, the more you win in this color sort game!

Nuts Sort brings endless fun with its unique twist on the classic color sort game. With thousands of levels, mysterious nuts, iron plate puzzles, and surprise challenges, you'll master every aspect of this nuts and bolts color sort puzzle!

Whether you're here to relax or aiming to become a sort-it master, Nuts Sort is just for you! Jump in and experience the ultimate nuts and bolts color sort game today!

Privacy Policy: https://nutssort.gurugame.ai/policy.html
Terms of Service: https://nutssort.gurugame.ai/termsofservice.html
descriptionShort: Train Your Brain in this fun nuts and bolts color sort game! Sort it your way!
